title: Alessandro Kräuchi
text:
Alessandro Samuele Kräuchi (born 3 June 1998) is a Swiss professional <a href="association%20football">football</a>er who plays for <a href="FC%20St.%20Gallen">St. Gallen</a> in the <a href="Swiss%20Super%20League">Swiss Super League</a>.
Club career.
Kräuchi made his professional debut with St. Gallen in a 2–0 <a href="Swiss%20Super%20League">Swiss Super League</a> loss to <a href="BSC%20Young%20Boys">BSC Young Boys</a> on 26 September 2018.
International career.
Kräuchi was born in Switzerland and is of Italian descent. He is a one-time youth international for the Switzerland U15s and U16s.
